overview: 101 Cheerleaders, 1 Jock, 1 Goal! Erik Everhard has Finally Met His Match! Erik Everhard had finally met his match as he takes on 101 of the steamiest vixens in the sex vid biz! Incredible non-stop action as girl after beautiful girl gives Erik the hardest ball game of his life! Erik Everhard sure is one lucky jock!
title: World's Luckiest Jock
